alert.note: Alert for Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:33PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson and northern Trimble Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 833 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madison, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Jefferson and northern Trimble Counties, including the following locations... Hanover, North Madison, Kent, Monitor, Ringwald, Manville, Hanover Beach, Brooksburg, Swanville and Milton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
